title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories on the x axis representing Month, and Sales in million units in each Month on the y axis.
The highest category is found at New Super Mario Bros. where Sales in million units is 30.8.
The lowest category is found at Super Mario 64 DS where Sales in million units is 11.06.
The highest value at New Super Mario Bros. is almost 2.78 times larger than the minimum value of Super Mario 64 DS.
The highest value at New Super Mario Bros. is almost 2.78 times larger than the minimum value of Super Mario 64 DS.
The difference between the max Month New Super Mario Bros. and min Month Super Mario 64 DS is 19.740000000000002.
